name: Time's Up (profLM)
description:
[This game is open source]

https://github.com/profkosmosic/TwoDesperados-Jam-2022

[DESCRIPTION]

You tried to keep your power under wraps but they found out. It's too late for a non violent escape plan now, shoot and dodge your way out of there and show them who they are messing with! Their time's up!

This game was made in 6 days for the Two Desperados 2022 game jam. The jam theme was "Time does not exist".

[CONTROLS]
  • Move - WASD
  • Look - Mouse
  • Shoot - Left Click
  • Jump - Space
  • Reload - R
  • Interact - E
  • Slow Down Time - Left Shift
[CREDITS]
  • Animation: Mixamo
  • Models: Unity Asset Store and TurboSquid
  • Textures: Texture Haven
  • Sounds: FreeSound
  • Everything else was done by me (Lazar Petrovic)
